com.mastergaurav.android.common.xml

类 Converter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mastergaurav.android.common.xml.Converter

  • public final class Converter
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to convert from String to pseudo-primitive types.
    Currently, the following types are considered to be pseudo-primitive types:
    1. String
    2. Short
    3. Integer
    4. Long
    5. Character
    6. Float
    7. Double
    8. Boolean
    9. Date

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.Object convertTo(java.lang.String raw, java.lang.Class<?> clz)
      Converts a String value to specified type, if possible.
      static boolean isPseudoPrimitive(java.lang.Class<?> clz)
      Check if a type is a pseudo-primitive type or not.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • isPseudoPrimitive

        public static boolean isPseudoPrimitive(java.lang.Class<?> clz)
        Check if a type is a pseudo-primitive type or not.
        参数:
        clz - Type being checked
        返回:
        true} if type is a pseudo-primitive type or not
        另请参阅:
        Converter}

      • convertTo

        public static java.lang.Object convertTo(java.lang.String raw,
                         java.lang.Class<?> clz)
        Converts a String value to specified type, if possible.
        参数:
        raw - Raw, string value, to be converted
        clz - Target type to be converted to
        返回:
        Converted value, if converstion was possible, null otherwise
        抛出:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the value was not in correct format, while converting to numeric type
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the value was not in correct format, while converting to Date or Boolean type
